title: Morning Light
lines: Like dawn breaking through the darkest night,
You fill my world with golden light.
In every moment, soft and clear,
I find myself drawn ever near.
Your grace, a gentle morning breeze,
Brings peace that puts my soul at ease.

title: Ocean Tides
lines: Like waves that dance upon the shore,
My heart beats for you more and more.
In rhythms deep and soft and true,
I'm drawn forever close to you.
Your love, a tide that gently flows,
Through every depth my spirit knows.

title: Starlight Promise
lines: In constellations written bright,
I see your name in every light.
A thousand stars cannot compare,
To the beauty that you bear.
With every breath, with every day,
I love you more in every way.

title: Whispered Dreams
lines: In whispered dreams where soft winds sing,
You are my heart's most precious thing.
A tender touch, a gentle smile,
That makes the journey always worthwhile.
In quietness, in deepest night,
You are my guiding, constant light.

title: Petals Falling
lines: Like petals soft that gently fall,
You are my greatest joy of all.
Each moment spent within your grace,
Is love made manifest, I trace.
In your eyes, a thousand flowers bloom,
Dispelling all my fear and gloom.

title: Eternal Spring
lines: With you, the seasons shift to spring,
Where hope and healing gently sing.
Your presence is a sacred place,
Where I can see my truest face.
In all the beauty that you bring,
My soul has learned to trust and sing.
